chapter.text: You approach the lone computer.^1500 It’s not as dusty as the others.^1500 You can barely see any dust at all.^1500 Piles of papers and books surround it.^1500 You glance at the papers and can’t even begin to understand what’s on them.^1500 You feel warmth as you pass your hand by the screen.^1500 You go to touch the monitor and flinch back.^1500 It’s hot.^1500 Someone was just here.
